<template>
  <Card class="profile-card">
    <template #title>
      <Avatar class="mr-2" size="large" :style="{
          background: 'url(\'https://sun9-14.userapi.com/impg/WmDWqYL258jJIbnRGTh4SUn1X4sbSfpyfLZ4rg/gyAFkJ8wTOU.jpg?size=811x1080&quality=95&sign=a550dded4c82c5384e70441d0e8a00c7&type=album\') center no-repeat',
          color: '#ffffff',
          marginRight: '20px',
          height: '100px',
          width: '100px',
          backgroundSize: '100px'
      }" shape="circle" />
    </template>
    <template #content>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. A aut eaque, est modi natus nesciunt sapiente sed similique soluta suscipit? Accusamus ea eaque eligendi eum expedita minus nihil recusandae temporibus!
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
import Card from 'primevue/card';
import Avatar from 'primevue/avatar';

export default {
  name: "profile-view",
  components: {
    Card,
    Avatar
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

  .profile-card {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    margin-top: 50px;
    max-width: 800px;
  }

</style>
